name: Tales of Fallen London: The Silver Tree
blurb: Decide the fate of a city in a game of love, intrigue and empire from the creators of Fallen London.

rewards.reward: An exclusive Silver Tree wallpaper, thanks on the game\u2019s credit page, and free access to the game\u2019s first purchasable story, the Emissary's Secrets. Gain the trust of the mysterious Cloaked Emissary and discover who (or what) he really is.

Succulent backer: all the Delicious backer rewards plus 5 action refreshes and access to the game\u2019s second purchasable story: The Other Place. Delve deeper into the spiritual world; learn the secrets of the warrior-shaman and find your way to the place behind mirrors.

Exceptional backer: all the Succulent backer rewards plus access to the third purchasable story: A Sip of Immortality. Follow a dangerous path to discover the secret of the Princess's Brandy, and live long enough to witness the theft of Karakorum. Plus, receive an exclusive Silver Tree in-game pet: a Restless Saker Falcon, a matchless hunter and the envy of the court.
Urchin: for Fallen London players! All Exceptional backer rewards plus an exclusive in-game pet in Fallen London: a Bitter Saker falcon, known to hunt devils in the Forgotten Quarter.

Esteemed backer: All Exceptional backer rewards plus exclusive Silver Tree content! A new story: the Warlord\u2019s Dream. A Prince's quest for justice threatens to spark war with China. Can you avert it, or would you rather set two empires at each others' throats? A special in-game item: The Sketch. Whose face have you drawn in your notebook? Investigate, and journey into your lost memories.

Tomb-Colonist: for Fallen London players! All Urchin level rewards plus an exclusive in-game artefact for your Fallen London character: a Leaf from the silver tree, allowing you to dream of the heyday of the Fourth City with your friends.

Distinguished Backer: All Esteemed backer rewards plus three high quality prints of Paul Arendt's concept art for The Silver Tree characters (as seen in the video), one of which will be signed by Paul!
Visionary Backer: All Esteemed backer rewards plus the Opportunity Deck, 40 beautifully illustrated and captioned cards inspired by characters and events from our games.

Oracular Backer: All Visionary backer rewards plus an expansion of ten special cards for your Opportunity Deck based on the events of The Silver Tree, including a special card signed by the game's writer and its artist.

Prophetic backer: For art lovers! Includes all the Fallen London and Silver Tree in-game content from the $60 level and below, an Opportunity Deck, the Silver Tree expansion cards (not including the special signed card) AND the three concept art prints (one of which will be signed by Paul). Plus an exclusive Fallen London in-game item: William of Paris' early designs of the Silver Tree!

Celebrated Backer: All Oracular backer rewards plus appear in Fallen London or The Silver Tree! We'll write a character into the appropriate game based on you to be encountered by our tens of thousands of players.
Immortal: for Fallen London Players! All the Oracular rewards plus be the first to own a Bottle of Hesperidean Cider for your Fallen London character! Never fear death again!

Renowned Backer: See your face in Fallen London or The Silver Tree! As Celebrated backer but send us a photo of yourself and our artist will draw a portrait inspired by it so your appearance in the game will be fully illustrated!
Royal Backer: All Oracular backer rewards, plus we will write a short, bespoke story in The Silver Tree that only your character can play.

Master: for Fallen London players! All Oracular backer rewards, plus we will write a short, bespoke story in Fallen London that only your character can play. You can specify what bit of Fallen London lore it\u2019s about, and we\u2019ll tailor it to your character\u2019s current level.
